Papa Surf | Local Jetsetter top of page GUIDES DIRECTORY PARTNERS REAL ESTATE Papa Surf Link Phone papasurf.com 850-278-6440 order pickup & delivery Burger Bar on Highway 30A ​ Papa Surf welcomes you to the best burger bar on Highway 30A! Founded by 30A locals and musician - Brian Kelley and his wife, Brittney - plus Jason Aldean and Tom Glavine, this collaborative team shares their love for gourmet burgers, music and sports all in one spot. Indulge in menu classics like The Beach Cowboy Burger with waffle fries, Blackened Mahi-Mahi Sandwich, Papa Salad and daily dessert specials. Escape to this renovated retro beach house turned burger bar, while sipping craft beer around a custom magnolia tree bar. Papa Surf is committed to cooking with fresh and locally sourced ingredients, plus offers vegetarian options so everyone can enjoy the menu. P.S. - Check their calendar for live music and events in Santa Rosa Beach, Florida! Terms + Privacy Policy connect@localjetsetter.com | Santa Rosa Beach, FL ©Local Jetsetter bottom of page

Papa Surf Burger Bar | JC's Gourmet | Santa Rosa Beach, FL | Emerald Coast 0 Skip to Content About Menu Locations Testimonials Contact Us Open Menu Close Menu About Menu Locations Testimonials Contact Us Open Menu Close Menu About Menu Locations Testimonials Contact Us Papa Surf Burger Bar Restaurants Sep 26 Written By Christie Solomon JC’s Gourmet products are offered as burger toppings on the menu of Papa Surf Burger Bar located on the iconic scenic highway 30A in South Walton. Their menu reflects the commitment to using fresh, high-quality ingredients, ensuring that every burger is a culinary masterpiece. From classic cheeseburgers with a signature twist to inventive combinations featuring locally sourced ingredients, every burger is crafted with care and attention to detail. Vegetarian options cater to the evolving dietary preferences of their customers, ensuring that everyone can indulge in the Papa Surf experience. Location Santa Rosa Beach Christie Solomon Founder of Elevate Next, Christie has an MBA in International Business from Thunderbird School of Global Management and extensive experience in marketing, public relations, finance, and project management. https://www.elevate-next.com Previous Previous The Club at the Henderson Beach Resort Next Next Palm Folly Hard Seltzer Join us on Social View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize Menu Contact Locations Subscribe Stay up-to-date on the latest news!
